description.value: The most common type of aarakocra, broad-wings are extraordinary fliers. If it weren't for their need to sleep, broad-wings might fly endlessly without reprieve on their large, 5-6 foot wide wings. This causes broad-wings to be very well traveled, seen in any and all parts of the world.

system.classDetails:
Broad-Winged Aarakocra Traits

  • Compatibility: Avian
  • Reduced Move Speed: Your ground speed defined by your core race is reduced by 5 feet.
  • Increased Flight Speed: Your flying speed is increased by +10ft.
    To use this speed, you cannot be wearing medium or heavy armor, and you must have 5ft of space on each side of you in order to take off.
  • Tendon Locking: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.JDCR1ON5Y5CP5RET]{Tendon Locking}
  • Extra Language: You can speak, read, and write one language of your choice.
